channel.title: How come I can't get on Moparscape forums
channel.description: Whenever I try to get on Moparscape forums it says "An error has Occured." Then is says "Sorry Guest, you are banned from using this forum! 3 day temp for spamming. Shut the hell up. 14 days for constantly breaking the rule number 12. Next time it will be permanent ban. " Can someone tell me why this is happening?

item.title: How come I can't get on Moparscape forums
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

I assume you're using AOL (based on a couple of ips you've posted from). AOL provides you with a different ip every time you connect, which means that you might be getting someone else's randomly who was ip banned. This is the primary negative aspect of ip banning. But if you try reconnecting, you should hopefully get a different ip without that ban message.
Incase you can't find it :P.

Read full topic
item.source: How come I can't get on Moparscape forums

[/quote]

BobDole is a very helpful person

Thanks for deleting all those spam threads… Did you ban the guy?[/quote]
The one who created the spam topics in Gen Discussions? A temp ban, yes
